alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 8:48PM CST until March 02 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN LE FLORE COUNTY... At 848 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Whitesboro to 2 miles northwest of Octavia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Whitesboro... Octavia... Muse... Big Cedar... Hodgen... Honobia... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
